message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.NE, cs.SY. 

The paper presents a reinforcement learning approach for a robot to learn to predict thousands of features of the world's state at different timescales. This involves learning a value function with a discount rate corresponding to the timescale, which is a common approach in reinforcement learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.RO (Robotics). The paper also involves neural networks and function approximation, which are common in the sub-category cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper presents a practical application of the approach, which could fall under the sub-category cs.SY (Systems and Control).
